Hi Mike
Im able to make junit tests work now .My java PATH variable and CLASSPATH
wasnt set correctly.So I set it in my .profile file.

Now its running fine

Im using junit 3.8.2 just to start with..I need to upgrade to junit 4 .

thanks

Rs
